item.title: Libbitcoin
item.description: Libbitcoin: A practical introduction or: libbitcoin’s bx tool: Constructing a raw transaction James Chiang https://twitter.com/kanzure/status/1171352496247365633 https://github.com/libbitcoin/libbitcoin-explorer/wiki/Download-BX Introduction I am going to talk about libbitcoin. It’s an alternative implementation of Bitcoin Core. There’s a few alternatives out there, like btcd and then bcoin. Libbitcoin is written in C++ and it’s the oldest alternative implementation that is out there. I’d like to show a few examples of what you can do with libbitcoin.
